sentences.english: Wendy:You have been to lots of places, but it's a pity you have never been to Alishan.
sentences.chinese: 还蛮多地方的，但是你没去过阿里山真是太可惜了。

sentences.english: Father took a trip to Mt. Ali last week.
sentences.chinese: 上星期爸爸去阿里山旅行。

sentences.english: Alishan and Sun Moon Lake are the centers of some of the best known stories.
sentences.chinese: 阿里山和日月潭是一些最知名传说的故事中心。

sentences.english: If you go there, you should not miss Sun_Moon Lake and Mount Ali.
sentences.chinese: 如果你去那里，你千万不要错过日月潭和阿里山。

sentences.english: I probably suggest you travel AliShan.
sentences.chinese: 我大概会建议你去阿里山。

sentences.english: Wendy:Please, the sunrise and cloud sea at Alishan are very famous.
sentences.chinese: 拜讬，阿里山的日出和云海很有名耶。
